title: Acer Swift 3 (2022) vs Dell XPS 13: Whatâ€™s the best laptop?
content:
In the past couple of months, many companies have introduced new versions of their laptops featuring Intel’s 12th-generation processors. One of them is Acer, which recently announced the Swift 3 (2022), featuring new P-series processors and other upgrades. But even with that in mind, can the Acer Swift 3 outclass the Dell XPS 13, which

The post Acer Swift 3 (2022) vs Dell XPS 13: What’s the best laptop? appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Acer Swift 3 brings some big upgrades over its predecessor, but is it good enough to beat the Dell XPS 13? Let's compare the two.
